website_summaries.verdict: So smooth and comfortable, you may fall asleep in these earbuds.
pros: Delivers high quality sound for all types of music and audio, evoking feelings from a somber string instrument to an old-school car radio with a heavy bass
Reviewers suggest the wooden earbuds create balance and maintain musical integrity as well
cons: If the earbuds don't adapt to your SmartPhone, customer service is expected to respond within 24 hours

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time the charm?
customer_reviews.text: The first time they sent me an "inexpensive" plastic substitute. The second time the left earphone for the pair I got promptly didn't work. In the meantime they have denied my negative posts (just like this one) as offensive. No response from customer service, no help from Amazon. I really want to like these. They look cool, they're light and the right earphone sounded good. But cmon.
customer_reviews.author: Widebandid

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality with good bass
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality with good bass! Very attractive and comfortable. The only problem is they quit working properly three months after purchased. They do come with a one year warranty, so if the seller/manufacturer honors it and replaces it I will edit my comment and rating. I might have gotten a bad on. UPDATE!!! After posting my initial rating, I was promptly and graciously contacted by Symphonized's Customer Service and was informed that they would take care of any issue I was having! In less than three days I received a new pair of NRG 3.0 Earbuds! Fantastic Company, I would highly recommend doing business with this company! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: OnlyAlad

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first use. A complete waste of money. I demand a refund! Update 11/14/17 The company has great customer service by replacing the broken ear buds. Although the second pair had the same problem. The inline mic is made of a cheap plastic that breaks in less than 7 days of use. These are some of the best sounding ear buds I've ever purchased, but the poor build quality is a huge downside. I wouldn't recommend thes for anyone who wants durable ear buds. I still demand a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel L.

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Wood Makes The Difference
customer_reviews.text: These are superior headphones. Very sturdy and well-made. The sound is crisp, clear and reduces background noise. It comes with 18 interchangeable ear tips (large, medium and small) a carrying pouch, and a clip. This company uses genuine wood that provides the best sound because of its natural acoustical properties. The inside of the world's most renowned concert halls and best acoustic instruments are made from natural wood, according to the product literature. It comes with a one year limited warranty. Made in Brooklyn, New York.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: I adore these headphones.  I've bought 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first pair 2 years ago and they're still in perfect condition. Just misplaced them so buying another pair. I also got them from a friend who's rather picky about headphones and he loves the sound quality was impressed with the jack design which protects the cable from damage (the straight ones tend to break where the cable meets the jack). The materials are good quality and look it. Decent noise canceling, too. Of course you'd get better headphones for bigger bucks, but I think these are the best in this price range (or even in the next price range).
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Customer service ruins quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the product is good, the only issue is the earpieces don’t fit. This is my second set of these headphones. First time customer service was amazing and expedited tiered plugs for me. This time it’s been over two weeks and my CS rep has been awful - rude even. Likes she’s doing me this massive favor sending me the tips so that I can actually use the product. Been over two weeks. Nothing and no sympathy just more attitude. Should have just returned them since I can’t use them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lizka

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Wooden Buds!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with my JVC wood cone speakers back in 2004, and was thrilled to see these sweet little buds. Sure enough, they rock! They have a smooth sound that is almost like a living sound. I have a rare condition where I have perfect hearing, my Dr. Is the man who invented the cochlear implant so I have it in writing, with no implant! I get irritated easily when ear buds have bad sound quality, and toss them in the garbage, but these wood buds hold my attention all the way till the end of the music. They don't over blast like some buds do, they genuinely sound delicious and perfect. So glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: SandyWells

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for bass lovers!
customer_reviews.text: It called my attention these earbuds for the price and the good reviews it has. I'm using these on my Galaxy S8 and the bass is very noticeable with the Adapt Sound turned off (Sound Quality and Effects settings on Galaxy S8). The sound quality on mids and highs is OK, but with the Adapt Sound turned on or an good equalization, these earbuds definitely awakes and provide excellent quality in all frequency ranges. It also has good noise insulation. For those complaining about the missing bass on the AKG earbuds included on the Galaxy S8/Note8, this is a good choice for an upgrade if you love bass ;)
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Usually a good value.  Disappointed w/ this model.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pairs by this brand. The sound is quite good for the price and they usually last longer than the average $30-45 pair by other brands. The hardware does wear out over time & prone to one ear only sound. This version/ model stopped working in one ear after literally 1-2 weeks of light use but Amazon had closed my return by then so I pretty much lost $27. :( Usually they are well worth the money but not sure about this model #.
customer_reviews.author: StellaSnowy

customer_reviews.title: Great for music not for calls
customer_reviews.text: For the same reason these are great for music they aren't great for calls. They really do a good job blocking out outside noise when listening to music. But, when using as a headset its awkward because you can hear yourself but it sounds like you're underwater and at least for me makes them not suited for calls. On phone calls you really do need more of a pass-through sound.
customer_reviews.author: MsquaredM

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earbuds I've owned in a long while, which is saying a lot. I've now tried several pairs of "cheaper" headphones with microphone and been disappointed by the quality. But the quality of these is great. It's nice to have the mic and the volume switch right on them as well. I highly recommend them. I use them at the gym and don't hear the gym's music of machine sounds over them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zarzuela

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks of use the volume control started lowering the volume to zero by itself. I could increase the volume to my normal level, but after a minute of so theearbuds again autmoatically lowered the volume to zero. This continued until I replaced the earbuds with another brand which I had available and the volume lowering never re-occurred. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, but volume control does not work on the iphone 8!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very, very nice for sound quality. Only one problem - the volume buttons do not work on the iphone 8. I figured they were defective, but they worked fine on my iphone 6. Huh. I contacted Symphonized and it looks like this problem is known and effectively working as designed. It was not disclosed on the product page - in fact as I write this, it says. "symphonized earphones are designed for the latest generations of iPod, iPhone and iPad." Not true, so it appears.
customer_reviews.author: stevieb

customer_reviews.title: What have you got to loose.?
customer_reviews.text: I have been and Audiophile, and these are by-far the best sound for the money. I know all of you out there are taking my word for this, but they are really a great buy. I have bought at least 5 headphones under the magic $100.00 dollar price point. Anyone can make a good $500.000 earbud, but I get off on cheap audiophile earbuds. Buy them. Now I dont have but maybe 20 hours on them, and I suspect a lengthy break in of maybe 50 hours. But, my first impressions is one of the best for a Parking ticket..
customer_reviews.author: William C. Kleckner

customer_reviews.title: Quality and style for a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a while back, they got damaged so I had to reorder again. I like these as they look cool being made of wood and the overall aesthetics is appealing. Sound quality is very nice and clear with decent bass. A mini volume control is attached on the earphone wire. The nice extras that it comes with are interchangeable earplugs for different size ear canals, a clip attachment to keep you ear phones on your clothing/bag/whatever. And a nice cloth bag to store it. Cost is a bargain considering the quality your getting.
customer_reviews.author: psyc0geck0

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound! this is my 5th Earbuds in 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! this is my 5th Earbuds in 4 years. That's the only brand I buy now. I just bought their bluetooth Noise consolation earbuds and it's on the way. I will wright a review about them once I get them. I do use the heck out of them. I wear in under my motorcycle hemet! They fit great under the helmet, they reduce the noise when they are off, and they sound great when they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Gadir

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds and I have a love hate relationship. They are easily the best quality that I've ever owned. The volume and sound quality are next to none. I'm extremely pleased there. My only complaint is that they are a bit on the heavy side and have no support over the ear. They stick out farther than most if not any earbud that I've ever used. Therefore the problem is they tend to fall out. Ad long as you use undersized buds so they go in a bit farther it's not as bad. These are great if you're using them while setting or laying but don't expect to do any sort of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Quality across-the-board, and then some!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as my spare 2nd pair to keep in my purse, for when I travel, bc I cannot be without these earphones. I've always been a strict Apple earphones person, but had to try this Brand to see what they were all about, and was not disappointed! I've dropped an ear piece full into my coffee, accidentally stepped on the ear piece a couple times, and work the same as they did before, and didn't break. These earphones, actually last alot longer than Apple, due to the design of the input aux as well. Brilliantly designed earphones!
customer_reviews.author: T.rok

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: SO i got these things because i hate the apple ones. THANK GOD. These things have been everywhere with me, on a plane, on a train, in a metro, running, walking around town and have even been in a washing machine. These things are still going strong and they sound so good. like REALLY good. They have a natural noise cancel thanks to the design of the ear piece, and if combined with a louder volume ( I listen lower than half volume on an iphone 8) they drown out everyone. SO worth the price, if these break I'll just get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Page

customer_reviews.title: ... in sound and construction of these headphones is actually amazing for $25
customer_reviews.text: The quality in sound and construction of these headphones is actually amazing for $25, so I’d highly recommend them. They are comparable, actually, BETTER than apple ear pods. I just had to return them because they were giving me a headache for some reason – I have issues with my ears so anything plugging them up/throwing off the equilibrium doesn’t work for me. I had hoped with the smallest buds this wouldn’t be a problem but it was. Oh well. Bummer because I really do like them.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: Hard use capable
customer_reviews.text: I have a vigorously physical job, often in confined spaces. Even though these earbuds get caught on door handles and all manner of things, accidentally jerked out of the phone socket and ears... These things keep plugging away. I've had a pair for over a year, (first model I think) and they only recently started to crackle with one speaker loosing sound. I beat the absolute h3ll out of these earbuds and have had more expensive ones fall apart much faster under the kind of abuse I put them through. Great sound too which is probably most important, and great passive noise cancellation. It comes with various sized rubber earbud tip sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lurp & Zond

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several other earbud headphones from Amazon in the past, including a popular one described as being ergofit, and I own a pair of Skullcandy's. These headphones are MUCH nicer than anything I've ever owned before. They have all the features one wants in a set of headphones: sturdy cabling, comfortable earbuds, adjustable sizing, right angle plug-in, a highly responsive microphone, and fantastic sound! I am so glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: New favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and wooden aesthetic. Sound is great, when I'm wearing these I can't hear anything else and its just what I want from a pair of headphones. Now before these I wore headphones that were shaped a little differently and these hurt my ears for a little while but I got use to the new fit in just a few days. Now they're my all time favorite headphones. Also the cord is that kind of flexible rubber that isn't too stiff, or too slippery which a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R.

customer_reviews.title: I Like The Sound.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I read the reviews. I looked over the plug. It looks fine to me. I don't know how others have broken plugs. They very well may have been defective. I also know there are a lot of people who are not careful with their gear. The plug should carefully go straight in and out. The sound quality is subjective. For my hearing these sound good. I like a little heavy bass. No earbuds have very good noise cancellation. I don't know why I had to rate that.
customer_reviews.author: NMSam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these earphones for about a day. First off packaging was a lot nicer than I thought it would be, it came with a huge variety of swappable earpieces, and a carrying case. That’s about where the positives end. The earphones themselves feel pretty cheap. The wire looks and feels thin, the plastics used feel very cheap and even the volume control lags for commands. Sound quality is abit below its price point. I would have probably been ok with spending $10 on these and no more. Spend your money on a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality and toughest ear buds I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look , the comfort and especially the sound quality as soon as I got these , now I was heartbroken when I realized that I had washed these and dried them in my pocket , that has ruined several sets of ear buds for me in the past , but I plugged them in hoping for the best and they still sound good as new . If that doesn't speak to the high quality I dont know what would. So glad I didn't destroy them they are the best ear buds I have owned .
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Landing

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn't work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the microphone wouldn't work when on a Zoom call - the noise quality and sound is great, but the mic on these headphones seems to be one-way so when I speak, nothing is picked up by the headset! Not worth the price given this feature flaw. To the supplier: Please refund my account - I expected $25 headphones to have a two-way microphone capability.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Short and to the point: I can't believe I only paid ~$25 for these headsets. They really sound good. Audio is clear and has great range. The mic works really well, too, as people I have talked to commented how better they could hear me. And I was oddly fascinated with the packaging. Its only something I see in higher priced headsets. My only complaint is the dual color of the cord. I'd rather it be a solid color.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Raffel

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship: great sound, non-tangle cords, sturdy construction!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality headphones and I'd wholeheartedly recommended them. The sound is fantastic with clear low, mid, and high tones. The cords and connections are sturdy and don't easily tangle like every standard Apple cord does. The cord is actually longer than I expected, too, and that is just an added bonus. The earbuds change easily between the sizes without ripping, and there are also a full set of black ear buds included if you don't like the translucent ones (shown in the picture).
customer_reviews.author: L. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality , unless you have always had cheap sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: With this headphone purchase, Idefinitely made a mistake trusting reviews on Amazon. Ihave no issues with the contruction or looks of it BUT, when it comes to audio quality, it is definitely sub-par. Bass is ok with pure audio quality wise, this is definitely muddy and thin sounding compared to quality units I've had in the past. DEFINITELY will NOT recommend this to anyone who cares about audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: GMFrancis

customer_reviews.title: Long life, amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I just lost these last week and went back to using my jlab headphones. It's been hard transition back. Ordering a replacement, I love these earbuds, the sound quality was so good and they lasted awhile Dec 2017- until I managed to loose them in the rain last week. :/ Really hope the new pair lasts like the first and I'll try to keep better track of them.
customer_reviews.author: B. laurenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones for the price. These are low cost and high quality with great sound and frequency reproduction. They aren't super high end perfect, but at ~$20 or $25 they are well worth the cost for a solid pair of headphones with a crap load of extra earbuds that come with it. Durable, sound good, good bass, good mid, good high. I've gotten these several times since I've lost a few and put one through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: 404UserNotFound

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were great, sound quality was good. They look very nice and unique. Comes with a cool case and extra earbuds. But only lasted 4 days before got snagged and the cord ripped. I never had that happen with any of my other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, awful mic
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great if all you need is to hear audio. The microphone; however, is awful. I've maxed out output volume in System Preferences, and people can't hear me when I'm talking at normal volume. I have to shout to even sound like a whisper. Highest I could get this to was 3 grey dots out of 15. Very disappointed in this product, and had to buy new headphones with a working mic. Swapping these out for my old half broken headphones had no issue, so I'm certain it's a problem with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: mark mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: One of the best earbuds I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: One of the best earbuds I've ever had, hands down. The sound quality of these earbuds is amazing! The bass is very good as well. They come with several different sizes of silicone earpieces, and they are very comfortable. My ears never get sore when I use these. The remote on the wires always works perfectly, and is easy to get to. You can turn the volume up and down, pause and play, and skip tracks using the remote. The audio jack where the earbuds plug into the phone is very strong and sturdy, and feels like it will hold up to a lot of use. And for the price you can't go wrong with these earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've purchase 2 pairs of these earbuds. The sound quality is good and for the most part the product is durable, but there is one achilles heel, the remote. When the remote came apart on my first set, I assumed that it was something I had done. When it happen to my second pair, I realized that it was a design flaw. I really like these earbuds, it's too bad that they don't last. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo H. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: ... I have a bit of a bias as I hate earbuds but I needed something extremely low profile and ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have a bit of a bias as I hate earbuds but I needed something extremely low profile and portable. That being said I am trying to be as impartial as I can be. Sound overall: 1/5 Tries so hard to be bassy that mids and highs suffer heavily and the base isn't that great to begin with. Sound for $25: 3.5/5 It does its job... Portability: 5/5 they are earbuds, small, portable and low profile. Every earbud would get 5/5. If sound quality and comfort aren't a concern you use earbuds. Looks: 5/5 Love the wood and chrome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good midrange, nonexistent bass
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to choosing this for a headset replacement. I had a good pair with fantastic bass and high end ranges from Razer. Unfortunately, the newer model has poor reviews. So, I decided to branch and look for something else. This set has good reviews with some mentioning a good range of sound, including bass. Well.... no... bass is pretty mediocre. For EBooks, light listening, hooking into a Roku remote, these would be good choices. For music, not so much. Spend more on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Achour

customer_reviews.title: value through and through
customer_reviews.text: For the price point and perhaps more than, I can say I truly believe these are the best earphones you can get! My only complaints are that these are not completely noise canceling and the earbuds themselves may be uncomfortable on smaller ears, but just play around with the flexible bud parts or order different ones and I think you can make it work. The acoustics seem nice, I like the level of bass reach, and they last quite a while if you are careful (don't ball them up haphazardly, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: S Dorantes

customer_reviews.title: These sound terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I used them almost everyday for about a month now. I am amazed at the sound quality these things have. They have excellent quality sound and they feel great in your ear. I recommend switching the eartips to the triple flange kind to get the most out of the bass they have to offer. They are very powerful and bass heavy and sound like a good Bluetooth speaker, like you are at a concert.
customer_reviews.author: LouA

customer_reviews.title: These sound remarkably good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sound remarkably good for the price; technology must be improving since the last time I bought earbuds. Also very pretty, with the wood bodies, and they have pleasant fabric-cased cords. I like noise-blocking earbuds better than headphones for use outside the home, since they're so much smaller to carry. Also cheaper than noise-canceling headphones. And finally, in extreme environments I can put noise-blocking muffs *over* the earbuds if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: David Dyer-Bennet

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, well packaged. I own the symphonic wraiths and love them. The sound of these were okay. I tried them with a variety of sources and they weren’t bad, especially for the price. Mids and highs are just as important to me as bass — I’m not mr. Bass — and these didn’t bring enough bass for me. Many will be happy with the sound quality for an in-ear at this price but I returned them. Again, they have some decent qualities but my ear I needed more
customer_reviews.author: J.J. Blickstein

customer_reviews.title: Look great, feel great, sound great.
customer_reviews.text: They look great, they feel great, and they sound great. The one thing I'm not a fan of is the micophone. The times I've tried having a conversation with these earbuds the person on the other side of the line always complains about excessive noise from my end, which disappears as soon as I unplug them from my phone. I've given up trying to use them for phone conversations, but I don't complain since I mainly use them for listening to music. Disclaimer: I have tested the microphone only on my phone (LG k20), so maybe it's not so bad on other phones.
customer_reviews.author: Guiro

customer_reviews.title: Delighted.  A +
customer_reviews.text: At their price, you will NOT be disappointed with the sound quality these earplugs put out! Really clear, clean trebles with balanced base. They are just terrific over the cheap earphones I've used in the past. The only reason I'd ever buy different earplugs would be if I wanted active (instead of passive) noise cancellation to use on an airplane. These do give the wearer a quieter environment, but not as quiet as active noise suppression.
customer_reviews.author: richard smith

customer_reviews.title: Get these your search is over ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I would recommend these, they’re AWESOME!!! I’m a bit of a “brand-whore” and would be so picky when it comes to quality sound. Bose were my go-to except Bose earplugs wouldn’t work with my ears. These would work for any ear, and the sound, the quality ... blows my mind how awesome it is with these!!! I’ve never been more excited about a product like I am with this one!!! 5 stars all the way!!!
customer_reviews.author: J2theMo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise cancelling capabilities
customer_reviews.text: These are great noise cancelling earbuds. I especially like using them on an airplane because you really can hear all the tones of music or whatever when you have these on. In fact, they are so good that when my seat mate on a recent flight was trying to talk to me, all I could do was see her lips moving; I couldn't hear her at all (until of course I took these out of my ears). I'm also especially impressed with the price. I don't think you could get better quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! But don't fit great
customer_reviews.text: The lady I sit next to at work chews on ice and listens to rap music. I literally want to stab myself in the ears when I hear that sound. I bought these to mask that sound, which it does perfectly! I don't know what is wrong with my ears, but trying every single variety of rubber earbud cap things - none of them fit correctly. Even twisting, pushing, etc., they always seem to want to fall out. Once I get them in, they are fantastic for noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieLion

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like these earbuds a lot. They fit really well and do a good job of keeping outside noise limited and the music front and center. The sound reproduction is also very good for the price. I like them so much I'm buying another pair of wired ones and I'm going to try there DRV blue tooth as well. I'm also buying the Amazon extended warranty for the blue tooth pair just in case.
customer_reviews.author: ShanBeau

customer_reviews.title: Really good!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean, deep sound. I haven't compared them directly to my over-the-ear headphones, but they feel good, fit in my ears, stay in my ears, and the wood seems to absorb and reflect back my body warmth...which is a nice, unexpected benefit after the all metal in ear buds that I had used before I got these. I may try another pair, the original, with the cloth covered wires, to see which is less likely to tangle in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Neely

customer_reviews.title: Good Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the price. Second set I’ve bought. (My dog chewed up the first.) Good clarity. I like to hear things as they were recorded. Emphasizing the bass is not my thing. I had a set of $200 ear buds in the past and will never spend that price again on ear buds as I didn’t feel the difference in sound quality was substantially different from these. This will be my go to brand for ear buds in the future, and I’ve tried over a half dozen brands at different price points. A few sounded just as good but were twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest BC

customer_reviews.title: Right Ear Bud Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: I have had two pairs of these in the past and they have been great. The only reason I replaced them is because they were misplaced. This is an updated version and the right ear bud quit working. This happens to be the side the mic is on so I'd say there are 75% unusable. These headphones are past the point of a refund or replacement; however they were purchased less than 6 months ago so I'd stay away from these. I hope the manufacturer/amazon reads this
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these headphones which lasted me over a year of almost daily use and being shuffled in and out of my purse. I liked them so much, I purchased two pairs to have a spare. For the price point, they are of good quality and my music sounds great. I am not an audiophile but have used several different brands of earbuds and these have been my favorite. The packaging is sturdy, and shipping is fast & efficient.
customer_reviews.author: RandomUser1212

customer_reviews.title: Wood earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set of headphones they come with a lot of extra tips to find your size the hard case is nice sound-wise the base is a bit flat had to turn my bass boost on on my phone to boost the bass phone calls are nice and clear the wood casing gives them an expensive look overall a nice set of headphones unfortunately I don't like the round design I'm used to the iPod style earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Even better than the NRG 2.0's. I upgraded to these due to the 2.0's I had finally coming apart after 2 years (wood was coming unglued, still function fine). The sound quality on the 3.0 is even better and these have not only the start/stop button but volume up/down as well. A very nice upgrade for an extremely reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart after two months
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed--I was so excited to purchase these and researched extensively. After two months of regular use, one of them just broke apart and is useless. With this, I plan to stop buying electronics on Amazon. They can show you any picture, say anything to get you to purchase, but once they arrive there is very little accountability. Planning to buy electronics in brick and mortar stores from now on.
customer_reviews.author: B. T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This pair is to replace a faulty pair with a broken wire. Contacted Amazon to inform them of the issue. Received a full credit since I'm hospitalized. Received replacement pair in 2 days. Outstanding sound. Several pair of silicone Earbud cushions ? Of varying sizes to customize fit. Cancels outside noise. Wiring seems slightly longer than most other Earbuds I've owned. That's subjective I don't have a different pair to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Fahy

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in September as a Christmas present. We’re working with the manufacture/seller having gone through two pairs in less than two months of use. My daughter really likes the look and sound but these are not durable at all. Perhaps we just got unlucky. In each case the wire between the microphone and earbud became loose and started to pull out from the mic/volume switch. Hopefully, the third time will work out.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Well these are definitely amazing but
customer_reviews.text: Ummm guys you really need to specify where the colors are. Because the earbuds I received I assumed the color would be on the earbuds themselves. I bought red but these earbuds do not look red it's kind of a stupid Petty thing. But I like the cherry wood appearance and this is clearly not it I'm going to order again next month since I can't afford to buy another pair. I really hope you guys will pay attention to what you ship out. If it's the cord that is supposed to be red you guys need to specify.
customer_reviews.author: kevin clyde

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre sound, super bulky earbud. Most frustrating thing is that they broke after less than a month of regular use (plastic volume/mic casing broke off). So incredibly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ExcitementMD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for its unbelievable durability
customer_reviews.text: Since the first time I had an iPod I've only boughten apple earphones. I never liked the type of earphones that go all the way to your brain much like these. I decided to give it a try, and MAN how I love this earphones. I LOVE the bass, I LOVE the noise cancellation. The only reason why they broke down was that I washed them. Even then they were still useable for like a month, till one side stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good for a couple/few months, then they'll break...
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviews say, they're awesome (amazing) for a few months and then...kaput. Right in the middle of a great Tom Waits song, no less. Just sitting at my desk at work and suddenly...tick tick tick tick tick tick in the left headphone. Now they're in the trash which SUCKS. Other than that, I loved these things and am super bummed they don't last. Some of the best sound quality and noise cancellation I've found in headphones. They're not exactly tangle free, and the weather seals broke almost immediately, but the quality was good enough to put up with that.
customer_reviews.author: MikeH

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have some very expensive headphones. These are not that kind of sound quality. But for the price they do fine. They are great looking too. Decent bass but not super clear on the high end. For kick around use I can afford to loose a set of these. I might get a second pair for use with my IPhone. I do think the stock IPhone earbuds are more balanced but these have a little more low bass.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best sound, and lasted almost 4 years! For me, that's a record...
customer_reviews.text: I used these to listen to all kinds of music, and for online school lectures. They are just now (after almost 4 years of daily use and being tossed into various purses, book-bags, etc.) beginning to show wear. Replacing them now as the mic has finally had enough abuse, and my online classmates don't appreciate those effects. Otherwise, the sound quality is still perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MARY CAPRINOLO

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great, but mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: These sounded great when I held the plug in just right, but would cut out and be full of static if I rotated the plug in the earphone jack. The effect was the same on two different phones, whether or not the case was removed, so I returned it for a refund. When I held the plug just right, the sound was good, so I would expect that usually these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - The new set I just bought is inferior to an older set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2017 and they were great. The plug recently got damaged when it got caught on someone's clothes when they were walking by me on a flight, so I ordered another set (2019). I'm really disappointed in the new set and will be returning it. Compared to the set I bought two years ago, the sound quality is inferior and the quality of the materials has gone down. The wires of my old set are very flexible and "grippy" like silicone while the wires on the new set are thinner and feel more like flexible plastic.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: These are great little headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed cheap earbuds to use with my laptop on the go or to watch movies on my phone in bed when my SO is sleeping so I did not want to spend a lot, and these had the best reviews. I am so glad I went with them, they sound great and the mic works well. They sound 10xs better than my built in laptop speakers thats for sure. Update: lasted 8 months and now the microphone cuts out constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Beezy

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Just got these less than 2 months ago, and this already happened - they were plugged into my phone in my pocket and I crouched down and felt it snap in my pocket. The plug always did seem too long to me. Before this happened they were OK at best - tried every ear insert they came with and always wanted to slip out of my ear. They had decent frequency response, but only when shoved deep in the ear and wouldn't stay there. Not worth the price in my opinion. They sounded better than super cheap headphones, but not any better than the standard wired apple earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: Really cool Earbuds but Company does not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased three of these Earbuds because my first two stopped working. Each purchase has been around $20 each. Not a huge cost, but would be nice if the company would return emails and honor its warranty. If you are looking for a product that will work long term and backed by a solid organization, do not buy these. There are others on the Amazon site that have similar capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Beil

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, brittle body
customer_reviews.text: I quite like the audio quality on these, but I find that the materials are very easily damaged. On the first pair I owned, one of the earbuds simply stopped working after a few months. I have a year long warranty on the first purchase, so I bought a second pair. When unplugging from my laptop last week, the headphone jack bent slightly. This wasn't an issue at first, but this morning, I noticed that the audio cuts out on one side if you nudge the jack. I don't manhandle my electronics, but these headphones-- while affordable, stylish, and good-sounding-- are brittle and don't last very long.

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality earbuds for the price. The sound does not rival some of the higher-end earbuds, but is superior to other similarly priced earbuds. The non-tangling cord is a great feature. There are only two issues that could be improved: 1) Having the volume controls and mic on the right ear, 2) Reducing static/feedback when plugging the earbuds into an iPhone or other device.
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound isolation to block out gym noise
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I workout in the gym. When sweaty, it does slightly slip out sometimes. But, most in ear earbuds do. Noise isolation is great. Before, with my regular, basic earbuds, I had a hard time hearing my music over all the machines. At the same level of sound with these, I could hear the music nice and clear. No need to go above the recommended loudness level to hear my music with these.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: I do not see an easy return/exchange policy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair I have purchased that stopped working within a few months of purchasing. So now, I have one pair that the volume control has completely fallen apart on, and another that only one earphone works. The second pair I purchased in May, and By June 16 they were dead. I will never purchase these earphones again. While the sound quality is great, they were NOT manufactured to last a reasonable period of time, as evidence that the warranty is ONLY 30 days. I should have read between the lines. Seriously?????
customer_reviews.author: alexis peterson

customer_reviews.title: Rich Sound
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound quality that comes through with these earbuds; it's rich and clear sounding. I also appreciate the fact that there is a volume button not far from the neck area/length of the cords. It's much easier to adjust the volume instead of having to pull the iPod out of my pocket. (Yes, I'm still listening to my play list on my iPod). :)
customer_reviews.author: Idaho gal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for school and he really don't use them--Now they are mine and I love it !! The packaging that it came in was so well put together and they came with several earbud options for all of you short, long weird ear people out there !! I actually used a set of those ear buds for my Bluetooth head set in the car. Amazing Even More !! I I will 100% certain I will re-order if I ever lose these.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, One Earphone May Stop Working After Regular Use.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four or five of these exact headphones over the past few years. They sound excellent, and I emphasize how great they sound! However, I keep buying them because they don't last; one side stops working eventually in my experience. Edit 08/18/2020: I ordered another pair of headphones from a different brand at a similar price and they are unacceptable. So, i'm reordering these symphonized headphones again because I trust their sound quality even though the wiring might give out after regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: OK EARBUDS
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are great for the price. The sounds that come thru are sounds I don't hear on my Bose mini Bluetooth speaker ( which I also like very much) that was $200.00. I am very happy . I bought my granddaughter another brand at Christmas that were about $40.00 , and I compared the sound and it was the same . Would buy again for myself and for gifting. Editing this review. After 5 uses , the sound went out. I'm a senior and am not using them to jog or at the gym. I was very careful in handling them. I am going to up grade to another brand. You get what you pay for !!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality horrible sound
customer_reviews.text: I had these particular earphones a couple of months ago. I purchased them and they broke. The sound quality was so good in the beginning that I decided to order another pair and just figured maybe I was too rough on them. Same thing happened with the second pair. The sound goes in and out I can only hear things periodically just like my last pair. My mom has a pair of swell and hers to the same thing. I am extremely disappointed and of course they only give you a very short window to return them so you're unable to return them when they actually malfunction. I would never repurchase these and I don't recommend anybody purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, better quality than Beats earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I liked the look of the wood earbuds. Found out they sound even better than they look. I've been through a lot of cheap ones, and even a pair of expensive Beats earbuds. These are the best I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Ti_gers

customer_reviews.title: Another pair failed, that's 4
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair I have purchased and all 4 have had issues on the flexible wire by the plug. I had one replaced under their one year warranty and have purchased a couple more. This pair failed 2 weeks past the return date. Part of me wants to send back for the warranty, part of me wants to write this review. I understand products fail but these are not some $5 pair you get at the grocery check out line after all. Need some changes to the plug so one side doesn't stop working after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Clay Lerch

customer_reviews.title: Symphonized NRG 3.0 Earbuds vs. Sennheiser CX 3.00
customer_reviews.text: My kid just purchased the $50.00 Sennheiser and then I did a little google research and this Symphonized came up and it looked like a lot of people like them so I went ahead and purchased them. I plugged both earbuds into the iPhone and listened to the same song and both earbuds produce excellent sound. The Sennheiser ones have the slight edge but not by very much. This Symphonized produce excellent sound as well at more than half the cost. When I told my other daughter that these cost less and have the volume adjustment buttons she got upset and want these now. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds. I use them for conference calls at work (rather than the old headset), or listen to soft music to drown out noisy officemates and while working out at the gym. They have been my faithful companion for 18 months now and just another one for my wife. She loves it too. Great quality, sound and durability to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Caridi

customer_reviews.title: Stay in your ear while using for sleep.
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible. I use these for sleep because my boyfriend snores like no other! I am a stomach sleeper and so naturally my head is turned to the side while my head is on a pillow. These remain in my ear during the night without any discomfort (which I cant say about others) and completely block out any noise. (I of course listen to white noise during the night) I love these. The chord is long enough so I can place the phone on a night stand by the bed and not completely beside me while I sleep. Again, love these. They are really comfortable for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Best ear- buds out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i went ahead and bought a 2nd pair. the sound quality is beyond excellent. it is the same stereo as large headphones. although i have warranty on the 1st pair they have functioned great for my 1st heavy duty use of them for approx. 5 months now. Get these they are great..... best earbuds you will ever buy. I promise.....update they lasted a year and 2 months....i have bought another pair...fits in ear smoothly..more base sounding...get them and tell yer friends too!!!...
customer_reviews.author: W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exalent product! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my ear pods and am very pleased with the sound quality. Major bass and everything in between. These ear pods scream quality and the wood seems to make all the difference in the sound quality as it does in a musical instrument. The extra set's of ear of ear pads make them fit perfectly in any ear, and do a major job in keeping outside noise to a minimum. I highly recommend these ear phones to all music lovers, or anyone who watches video on their mobile devices. They arrived exactly when promised and in good condition. I would most definitely do business with this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Fugueman

customer_reviews.title: don't block out outside noise
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok. Be aware this is an open design, they really don't block out outside noise. Wearing the on plane gave no level of relief from plan noise. They are probably good for those who want this type of design, but not for me. Gave them to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Silverbear

customer_reviews.title: Tons of bang for the $$. Poor warranty.
customer_reviews.text: So far there is nothing I dislike about these earbuds. They are extremely comfortable, attractive and have fantastic sound. Seeing I just purchased them I really can’t give durability rating. Update 11/6/18. One of the sleeves that connects near the earbud has loosened up and slips down. Sent email to Symphonized and was told that it was just cosmetic and their warranty does not cover this. I find this a disturbing policy for something that is just 1.5 months old. I am afraid that the cable will now either rip out or the insulation will be cut but the metal piece. No because of their warranty I cannot recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Grayhair

customer_reviews.title: Best for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are really great. The sound is excellent as far as earbuds go, if you get a snug fit, the bass is actually quite nice, with plenty of response in the rest of the frequency spectrum. They also look great and people think they are very cool. Update: The squishy earcups started to rip after a long time of use. I messaged Symphonized and they were happy to send me new ones right away for free. The new ones fit even better and go further in the ear, so now I'm even happier with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, piece broke after two months of use
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is good, they have a comfortable fit and a good look. I haven't really noticed the noise cancelling. The black wire protector piece on one of the earbuds broke after two months' of use. Still usable, but pretty irritating. Doesn't leave me with a lot of faith in the longevity. I won't be purchasing these guys again, despite the sound being pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Katdi

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these because I hate trying to hunt down a pair when I need them. They have lasted quite a long time with the only issue being they separate from the wood piece. It's a quick fix, a little glue and they're back as good as new. I find that they are good quality and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Gr8shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bass!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wood finish and I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality far as the bass is concerned. The voice quality was fairly clear, sounds a little like a concert hall/echo-ish sound, but I was more impressed by the bass quality. They really added to the pleasure of my listening experience to my musical tunes and movies. They definitely block out exterior sound. I think they’re most satisfactory for the price! I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Updated
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE Symphonized sent me a new pair of headphones, and these ones work marvelously!! The sound is nice and crisp, and I've made and received some calls with them, and I never had any choppy audio or any distorion at all. Extremely satisfied with them, and I'll definitely be buying from Symphonized again!! It came defective right out of the box unfortunately. The right ear bud has no sound at all, which is a shame, because the one on the left sounds really good... Material seems really nice, and it looks pretty cool, but can't enjoy them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones Fell Apart - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite some time ago but sadly it broke after a month of light usage ( I barely listen to music) I typically only used them while I was on the computer for occasional video games or Tv and they actually seemed to be of good quality and with the good reviews, I didn't expect them to legit fall apart. I decided to post this to help out other people so that is all I have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Scears

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in the hope that it would help with noise reduction as well. The earbuds arrived just in time to try them out while the roof of my home was being replaced. I found that it did reduce the noise from the hammering and nailing as well as giving great sound quality. This would be a great "something special gift" for the hard to buy for. It also came with a nice assortment of ear pieces and a cloth bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: marcar

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling is weak, but sound quality compensates
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them fir about a month now and I gotta say the noise canceling isn't that good, can still hear fan at night, however the sound quality fir the price is extremely good to pass on; even had to turn off Samsung galaxy S9 Dobly Atomos feature, usually that feature boosts the headphones sound but somehow sounds best without that feature on when using these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Angel R. Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound great and fit wonderfully. At this price it's an instant purchase. If I ever need to buy more earbuds I will buy this again with out a second thought. Clear sound with a large range. Good full base and clear highs. This makes it very versatile for different genres of music. The microphone clarity is great. Haven't had any complaints while using this microphone for phone calls. Simple to use in line buttons for volume control. Also a nice touch to have the travel pouch. Makes it easy to store in a backpack or pocket and protect it. All in all I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: For the price, yes.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm not a huge fan of in-ear headphones. I do not like the battle of keeping them in. As for the headphones themselves, they were definitely worth their price for the sound that is produced for a set of in-ear headphones. The wires are a little flimsy. Sound quality is good for MP3 quality or Spotify. I wouldn't call these durable. While they have not broken on me yet, they are also not my daily driver. I can only assume they would not last the rigors of daily use. For the price, they are a decent set. So, if you haven't found the perfect in-ear set, then give these a try. You may love them.?.
customer_reviews.author: ry-mac

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually pretty rough on my earbuds, and I find that a lot of brands don't hold up for very long--sooner or later (usually sooner), the wire gets screwed up and one or both of the speakers stops working. Not so here! I've had these for about a year now and they're still going strong. I like the sound quality, and I like the look of them too.
customer_reviews.author: tarheelsooner

customer_reviews.title: The wood makes the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the fact that these earbuds are made of wood that gives them a deep resonance of tone in the sound that is produced. They are also durable and have outlived a number of more expensive pairs. I use them every day as I listen to audiobooks while shopping, walking my dog, etc. I can highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I beat my last pair absolutely to death and broke a wire - I'm glad to have these as a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I am devoted to Symphonized earbuds when on the go and I refuse to use any other brand! I beat my last pair absolutely to death and broke a wire - I'm glad to have these as a replacement. Please note that these are durable and don't break easily; I had some luggage go through some brutal treatment and it was too much for my much-loved earbuds. Wood resonance FTW!
customer_reviews.author: A-E Shapera

customer_reviews.title: Sound just stopped!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had these headphones a few months and have been loving them. Then they suddenly stopped working. I thought maybe I hadn't pushed the jack into my phone, but that wasnt the case. There is simply no sound coming through. It's really disappointing. I loved these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kay-kay

product_meta.title: Symphonized NRG 3.0 Wood Earbuds Wired, In Ear Headphones with Microphone for Computer & Laptop, Ear Phones for Android with Stereo Sound (Black & Gray)
feature_bullets: STEREO HEADPHONES HANDCRAFTED FROM ALL-NATURAL, GENUINE WOOD: Our earphones tap into the natural acoustic qualities found in wood to produce crisp acoustics and deep bass. Prepare to experience studio quality, stereo sound with the Symphonized NRG 3.0 Wood In Ear Head Phones.

UNIQUE COMFORT FIT AND IN-EAR DESIGN: Custom silicone ear tips that are available in three sizes (S/M/L) are able to create noise isolation and reduce ambient noise to ensure the best audio experience, as well as the perfect fit for maximum comfort during long-term wear, such as for running.

USER-FRIENDLY, CORDED EARBUDS: Features include volume control, pause/play capabilities, answer/end call function, voice control, and a smart inline microphone, giving you complete control over your listening experience during gaming, running or sports.

WIRED EARBUDS WITH STYLE FOR EVERYONE: These ear buds offer something for everyone, available in six different color options, with a fashionable dual-toned and tangle-free TPE cord; The NRG 3.0 is where durability, practicality, convenience and style meet.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: With the combination of luxury design and high sound quality, Symphonized in ear buds are compatible with the latest generations of your favorite devices: iPod, iPhone, iPad, Android, tablets, computers, and more, with a standard 3.5mm audio jack.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars11,384 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Noise-Isolation, android-phone-control, ios-phone-control, deep bass, universal-phone-control, stereo, sports-and-exercise, Microphone-Feature, ofc cord, lightweight
